item.title: Is it possible to use OpenEars in raspberry pi?
item.dc:creator: steveshu
item.description:
Hello, I am new to this forum. It looks like OpenEars is only designed for iOS. Is it possible to use it in embedded device, eg, Raspberry Pi?

Regards,
Steve

item.title: Reply To: Is it possible to use OpenEars in raspberry pi?
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Welcome Steve,

Sorry, OpenEars is iOS only, but you should check out Pocketsphinx from CMU which OpenEars uses as its speech engine since it is primarily developed for Linux: http://cmusphinx.sourceforge.net/
